author: donaldp
msg: Update todo to reflect the fact that some things have already been implemented.

author: donaldp
msg: Update to use SAR-INF/environment.xml rather than SAR-INF/server.xml if SAR-INF/environment.xml is present in .sar. If environment.xml does not exist then a warning is issued and server.xml is used.

author: donaldp
msg: Update sar task so that it stores the environmental information in SAR-INF/environment.xml rather than SAR-INF/server.xml so as to be in line with latest Phoenix deployment format.

author: donaldp
msg: Corrected english in changes log and pointed it to an existing document rather than create a new one.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a changelog target based on Alexandrias task.
Remove tools/** and build.sh/build.bat from the distributions.
